mapper.insert: insert into USER_RESUME ( USER_ID, TITLE, ATTR_JSON, SALARY_WANTED, SALARY_WANTED_TEXT, ROLE_WANTED, ROLE_WANTED_TEXT, APPLY_LOCATION_CODE_JSON, EDU_LEVEL, EDU_STATUS, EDU_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU_MAJOR, EDU_START_YYYYMM, EDU_END_YYYYMM, CAREER_JSON, LICENSE_JSON, CONFIRM_RECOMMENDATION, USE_YN ) values ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{salaryWanted}, #{salaryWantedText}, #{roleWanted}, #{roleWantedText}, #{applyLocationCodeJson}, #{eduLevel}, #{eduStatus}, #{eduSchoolName}, #{eduMajor}, #{eduStartYYYYMM}, #{eduEndYYYYMM}, #{careerJson}, #{licenseJson}, #{confirmRecommendation}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: update USER_RESUME set TITLE=#{title}, ATTR_JSON=#{attrJson}, SALARY_WANTED=#{salaryWanted}, SALARY_WANTED_TEXT=#{salaryWantedText}, ROLE_WANTED=#{roleWanted}, ROLE_WANTED_TEXT=#{roleWantedText}, APPLY_LOCATION_CODE_JSON=#{applyLocationCodeJson}, EDU_LEVEL=#{eduLevel}, EDU_STATUS=#{eduStatus}, EDU_SCHOOL_NAME=#{eduSchoolName}, EDU_MAJOR=#{eduMajor}, EDU_START_YYYYMM=#{eduStartYYYYMM}, EDU_END_YYYYMM=#{eduEndYYYYMM}, CAREER_JSON=#{careerJson}, LICENSE_JSON=#{licenseJson}, CONFIRM_RECOMMENDATION=#{confirmRecommendation} where USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into USER_SCRAPPED_JOB_AD (USER_ID, JOB_AD_ID, MEMO) values ( #{userId}, #{jobAdId}, #{memo})
mapper.update: update USER_SCRAPPED_JOB_AD set MEMO=#{memo}, LAST_MOD_DT=current_timestamp where USER_ID=#{userId} and JOB_AD_ID=#{jobAdId}
mapper.delete: delete from USER_SCRAPPED_JOB_AD where USER_ID=#{userId} and JOB_AD_ID=#{jobAdId}
mapper.select: select JOB_AD_ID from USER_SCRAPPED_JOB_AD where USER_ID=#{userId} order by LAST_MOD_DT;
select J.*, S.LAST_MOD_DT as LAST_MOD_DT from USER_SCRAPPED_JOB_AD S, JOB_AD J where S.JOB_AD_ID=J.ID and S.USER_ID=#{userId} and J.USE_YN='Y' order by LAST_MOD_DT;
select J.*, S.LAST_MOD_DT from USER_SCRAPPED_JOB_AD S, JOB_AD J where S.JOB_AD_ID=J.ID and S.USER_ID=#{userId} and S.JOB_AD_ID=#{jobAdId} and J.USE_YN='Y'
